title: Les Salonnieres: Bali Hai
desc:
Do you miss house parties? So do we. And that?s exactly why we?re bringing them back. ? ? ? ? ? Adam Aleksander Presents is reviving our monthly event series in NYC,? Les Salonnieres , and we want to start off with a bang. ?It?s time to whip out your spiritual hula skirt?as we bring you Bali Hai, a John Waters-themed tiki party. ? ? ? ? ? On ?Saturday, December 12th , guests will arrive at a Tiki collector?s? secret Williamsburg loft .? This intimate house party will span over two floors, fueled by music, craft cocktail punches, burlesque performers, and luau-style activities. Only a few dozen tickets are available; they are $25 and are all-inclusive. ? ? ? ? ? This is a costume party and the theme is loose. Every guest?is encouraged to dress as if John Waters personally styled them.? ?So bust out your vibrant patterns, jewels, or muumuu and make? Divine ?proud. 
 ? ? ? ? ? Ticket holders will receive the address 24 hours prior to the event. 
 
 
 
 ? ? ? ? ?  We are so excited to be hosting our?friends through Les Salonnieres?again, and we hope you?ll consider joining us for this very special evening.
